title: I miss old Vlad. :(
body:
You were literal garbage early game, but as the game went on, you were slowly becoming a monster. You could clear waves like nothing with stacked E, it was an amazing feeling to destroy a minion wave, no matter how many are there. Now, a single fuckin' fatass minion can block your whole dmg. I hate the Q bar too, it's telegraphed and in lane you'll never do it and enemies know your Q cd thanks to the bar filling up. He's still a balance nightmare anyway, either too good or too bad.
But, this Q animation I miss the most. :( Best skin in game before that fucking rework ruined it. Now you don't even see it, it's just some almost invisible one red line.

http://s285.photobucket.com/user/joc_92/media/vlad1_zpspxtoz4x1.png.html

replies.body:
He continues to be SUPER safe when mastered. 

His damage potential is now astronomical late game.

His presence in a team comp continues to nearly always ensure late game Scaling superiority. 

His R is still game breakingly good and 2 second Tides of Blood is God.

> Tides of Blood is God.

Well thank you.
The skin shouldn't cost 1820 RP after they screw up the animations on the Q and at this point its better to use Soulstealer.
